::Shadow Wing::

Swoops down and lands near Ramulus.
"What treaty?  What sease fire? Are we not Maximals?  Are they not 
Predacons, our enemy?"
She stretched out her wings and refolded them back.
"Why are we taking sides with our enemies? Is there something worse out 
there than a Predacon?"
